title: Avoid range exceptions when collections empty
body:
### Context

While writing a unit test, I hit exceptions here due to having empty collections.

### Changes Made

Ensure a non-negative number is passed for the list's capacity.

### Testing

Fixed error I was seeing in unit test.

commit.message:
Avoid range exceptions when collections empty

While writing a unit test, I hit exceptions here due to having empty collections.

nodes.body: I'm not sure. My test had a project with no SDK and no imports, which I guess is something one would see in the wild.
